title: Geographic data for Uralic languages as CLDF dataset derived from Rantanen et al. "Geographical database of the Uralic languages"
description:
Cite the source of the dataset as:

Rantanen, Timo, Vesakoski, Outi, Ylikoski, Jussi, & Tolvanen, Harri. (2021). Geographical database of the Uralic languages (Version v1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4784188
